name: Target: Hive'Zora Waywatchers
tooltip:
Target: Hive'Zora WaywatchersLevel 60

Slay 30 Hive'Zora Waywatchers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Hive'Zora Waywatcher x 30
